mapper.select: SELECT * FROM AnalysisData order by recordDate desc
SELECT * FROM AnalysisData WHERE stockCode=#{codeNum} order by recordDate desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AnalysisData (STOCKCODE, SUPPLY, INFLUENCE, TREND, CONTENTS, SCALE, RESULT, RECORD_DATE) + VALUES(#{codeNum}, #{supply}, #{influence}, #{trend}, #{contents}, #{scale}, #{result}, #{record_date})
